description: T48 Horse Chestnut x 1 (Aesculus hippocastanum) lift all round to 3m; T74 Lime x 9 (Tilia spp) lift to 5m (predominately trunk epi growth)- remove basal growth- remove deadwood; T88 Sycamore x 3 (Acer pseudoplatanus) cut back from buildings to allow 2.5m of clearance- lift all round to 3.5m- cut back from road- cut back from street light- remove deadwood; T91 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) - Lift to 3m- remove basal growth- cut back from light; T92 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) trim into dome by 0.5m all round;T87 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp)  lift to 3m- remove basal and trunk epi growth- remove deadwood; T115 Hazel x 4 (Corylus avellana) trim all round into dome; T116 Turkey Oak x 1 (Quercus cerris) lift all round to 3m- ensure road sign can be seen from Uxbridge road; T117 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) lift over road and footpath to 4m- remove basal growth- remove deadwood;T118 Lime x 1(Tilia spp) - Lift to 3m- remove basal growth; T119 London Plane x 1 (Platanus x hispanica)- lift all round to 4m- remove any massarias; T120 Lime x 1 (Tilia spp) trim all round to create dome; T123 Small leaved Lime x 1(Tilia cordata)  cut back from road by 1.5- remove deadwood- lift all round to 3m; T124 Silver Birch x 1(Betula pendula / alba)Lift all round to 2.5m; T125 Lime x 1(Tilia spp) lift all round to 4m- remove basal growth;T126 Lombardy Poplar x 1 (Populus nigra 'Italica') Lift all round to 4m ;T131 White Poplar x 1 lift over car park to 4m- lift over seating area
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
